name: Incline Hammer Curls
instructions: Seat yourself on an incline bench with a dumbbell in each hand. You should press firmly against the back with your feet together. Initiate the movement by flexing at the elbow, attempting to keep the upper arm stationary.

name: Wide-grip barbell curl
instructions: Seat yourself on an incline bench with a dumbbell in each hand. You should press firmly against the back with your feet together. Initiate the movement by flexing at the elbow, attempting to keep the upper arm stationary.
